latest.title: Further Invalid Requisition of General Meeting
latest.content:
20 Jan 2026 11:51
RNS Number : 6244P
Union Jack Oil PLC
20 January 2026
20 January 2026
Union Jack Oil plc
("Union Jack" or the "Company")
Further Invalid Requisition of General Meeting
Union Jack Oil plc (AIM: UJO, OTCQB: UJOGF), acknowledges the receipt of a second purported requisition notice dated Monday 19 January 2026 at 17:19 (the "Second Purported Notice") from former director Craig Howie.
After reviewing the Second Purported Notice and taking legal advice, the Company did not consider the Second Purported Notice to be valid.
However, subsequent to that review, on 20 January 2026 at 07:16, prior to the market open, Craig Howie informed the Company that he withdrew the Second Purported Notice.
Consequently, the media commentary this morning in relation to the Second Purported Notice was premature, given that the Second Purported Notice was withdrawn prior to market open.
For further information, please contact:
Union Jack Oil plc
info@unionjackoil.com
David Bramhill
SP Angel Corporate Finance LLP
+44 (0)20 3470 0470
Nominated Adviser and Joint Broker
Matthew Johnson
Richard Hail
Jen Clarke
Zeus
+44 (0)20 3829 5000
Joint Broker
Antonio Bossi
Simon Johnson
George Duxberry
Gneiss Energy Limited
+ 44 (0)20 3983 9263
Financial Adviser
Jon Fitzpatrick
Luke Kanczes
Harbour Access

USA Investor Relations
Jonathan Paterson
